title: i cant log in my account after you help

replies.body:
It looks like a poro spilled something on that login servers earlier today -_-'....

It should be all fixed up now, but if you're still having issues you can join the [**discussion going on in this thread**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/WEK0auGA-unable-to-connect-to-the-login-queue). I believe the Rioter in that post knows a bit more about what happened.
An unexpected error has occurred while logging in the error what to do?
